description:
Mikio Osawa is an average 5th grade school boy who lives in the suburbs of Osaka. Mikio likes Haruko Tezuka, a cute little girl in his class. However, Mikio is too shy and withdrawn to tell Haruko that he likes her. One day, Mikio`s close friend Megane brings news that Haruko is about to move away to another town...
Source: crunchyroll
